meanings.definition: The act of burying a dead body.
meanings.sent1: The burials took place at sunset.
meanings.sent2: The burials in the cemetery were solemn.
meanings.sent3: The burials were so quiet, even the birds seemed to pay their respects.
meanings.sent4: The burials were like seeds planted in the earth, waiting to bloom again.
meanings.sent5: The burials under the old oak tree were a peaceful sight.

meanings.definition: The process or ceremony of burying a dead body.
meanings.sent1: During the burials, everyone wore black.
meanings.sent2: The burials were conducted with great care and respect.
meanings.sent3: The burials turned into a dance of remembrance under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The burials were a tapestry of traditions woven together.
meanings.sent5: The burials echoed with the whispers of those who had gone before.

meanings.definition: The place where a dead body is buried.
meanings.sent1: The burials were marked by simple headstones.
meanings.sent2: The burials in the churchyard were well-tended.
meanings.sent3: The burials became a secret meeting place for the neighborhood cats.
meanings.sent4: The burials were a library of stories waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The burials overlooked a peaceful valley.
